name: The Masks We Wear (TheoTGames)
description:
A simple, short game about living with OCD.

Game moments are inspired by personal thoughts, feelings and situations, and may not necessarily be reflective of all OCD sufferers.

Unfortunately, I couldn't dedicate more than a few weekday evenings to this project, so you may come across some known and unknown bugs. One known bug is the main theme song doesn't play (muting then unmuting your sound will fix it).

Controls:

Click/Space Bar: Interact/progress text.

Please consider contributing, however little, to one of the many great mental health charities available. A few are listed below:

Mind: https://www.mind.org.uk/

Young Minds: https://youngminds.org.uk/

Mental Health Foundation: https://www.mentalhealth.org.uk/

Rethink: https://www.rethink.org/

Together: https://www.together-uk.org/

Heads Together: https://www.headstogether.org.uk/
